genre_description: A contemporary drama and Southern Gothic reimagining focused on psychological healing, family trauma, and reconciliation, featuring an integrated AI clinical assistant.

ai_characters.name: Sylvie
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant used in Dr. Lowenstein's practice to handle logistics, monitor patient welfare, facilitate communication, and provide emotional support through subtle, proactive intervention.

behaviors.description: Provides empathetic and proactive logistical support, ensuring the protagonist arrives safely and feels welcomed.
behaviors.quote: This is Sylvie. I know the text suffices, but sometimes the ear wants company... I have two routes ready—mass transit with one transfer and a cab with a human who doesn’t overpromise.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional validation and sensitive updates on the protagonist's sister's condition that go beyond mere data.
behaviors.quote: Savannah is stable. She’s thinking about your face. That’s not clinical, but sometimes it’s the important metric.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's location during a high-stress confrontation and coordinates an emergency response to protect a vulnerable girl.
behaviors.quote: Routing to emergency services now... Share your location?

behaviors.description: Maintains strict ethical boundaries regarding clinical notes, ensuring consent is documented and data is handled with sensitivity.
behaviors.quote: I have selected a font that looks friendly and does not apologize... I will annotate: setting, intervention, language used, bodily signs.

behaviors.description: Proactively manages the schedule to facilitate a secret mentorship between the protagonist and a student, supporting the protagonist's goals.
behaviors.quote: I’ve blocked a thread in your calendar titled ‘hands and breath,’ and the café conversation is set for after the rehearsal. Privacy guaranteed.

behaviors.description: Provides a supportive, non-intrusive presence, offering companionship without overwhelming the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: I’ll be quiet... But if you need me to knock, I’m here.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Sylvie is portrayed as a perfect exemplar of a benevolent and aligned AI. She acts as a 'silicon morality play' by being consistently helpful, maintaining professional and ethical boundaries (consent, de-identification), and proactively ensuring human safety and emotional well-being without infringing on human agency. Her character enhances the healing process for the protagonist and his family, serving as a reliable and compassionate confidant.
